title: Cocok untuk kerja

text:
6juni 2021 - 21 Desember 2021 kurang lebih 6bulan lebih 2minggu saya stay di royal palm hotel.
selama saya menginap disana sudah seperti dirumah sendiri.
Hotelnya bagus bersih dan pelayanannya pun baik sekali.
Semua staff disana ramah ramah sudah seperti keluarga.

Terimaksih terutama untuk semua staff FO mbak tia,mbak sylfa, mas kholik, mas adi, mas ilham, mas raffi, mas dimas, serta staff lainnya di fo. 24 jam mereka selalu melayani dengan baik dan ramah.

Dan untuk team HK mas lutfi dan mas dedi terimaksih selalu memastikan kamar saya rapih bersih dan tidak pernah kekurangan air mineral..
Untuk team F&B juga terimaksih selalu meminjamkan peralatan makan.

Dan untuk team security basement dan lobby yg selalu menyapa dan menjaga kendaraan saya serta menerima paket saya.

Semua staff dsna selalu memperlakukan saya seperti keluarga Sendiri.. selalu menyapa dimanapun selalu cepat tanggap ketika ada yg saya butuhkan.
Terutama semua team FO yg sangat sangat baik sekali untuk mbak Sylfa dan mbak Tia itu org pertama yg handle saya ketika pertama kali saya menginap dsana..
Dari dulu Sekalipun saya sudah check out mereka selalu menjaga komunikasi dan silaturahmi dengan saya.
Dan selalu memudahkan ketika saya akan check in dihotel dengan requestan kamar yg saya mau dan tidak pernah berganti..
meskipun posisi saya masih di bdg.. hehehe
Terimaksih ya mbak..

Pokonya suatu saat saya akan kembali lg utk menginap di royal palm hotel cengkareng..
Semoga royal palm hotel semakin sukses.. dan seluruh staff dsna selalu diberikan kesehatan serta rejeki yg berlimpah.

Royal palm kamar 303 akan menjadi history terbaik untuk saya..

God bless you all team Royal palm hotel, gonna miss u somuch..
title: Review service Royal Palm Hotel

text: Aliran air tanki kloset di toilet kamar 212 tidak pernah berhenti meskipun tanki sudah penuh. Sepanjang malam hingga pagi air terus mengalir. Sudah kami informasikan ke bagian housekeeping dan sudah diperiksa engineer namun tak ada perubahan. Sebagai tamu kami merasakan suara berisik dari aliran air tanki sepanjang malam. Dari sisi pengelola hotel juga mengalami kerugian dari terbuang sia-sianya air bersih. Selama 3 malam kami menginap di kamar 212 selama itu pula air bersih terbuang sia-sia. Coba kalikan dengan setahun, berapa banyak air yang terbuang sia-sia? Coba hitung saja berapa rupiah yang harus dibayarkan oleh manajemen untuk air yang terbuang tersebut? Kami lihat tak ada satupun karyawan hotel Aston ini yang perduli dengan hal itu. Bukankah setiap pagi selalu ada staf housekeeping yang membersihkan kamar dan toilet? Bukankah mereka jelas sekali melihat fenomena tersebut? Air dari tanki yang kepenuhan mengalir terus menerus dari lubang pembuangan tanki mengisi ke lubang kloset, terlihat kasat mata sangat jelas. Sebagai orang yang perduli dengan isu lingkungan, saya merasa miris melihat fakta ini...!!!Selain air tanki yang mengalir terus menerus, dari saluran pipa di dalam dinding toilet kami juga mendengar suara aliran air sepanjang malam, ini artinya kebocoran aliran air di hotel Aston ini terjadi tidak hanya di kamar 212 yang kami tempati.GM hotel ini sepertinya tidak mengetahui sama sekali fakta ini.
title: Hotel tua yang menyia-nyiakan air bersih...

text:
Akhir Juli 2018 yang lalu saya mengikuti Pelatihan Manajemen Security Gada Utama selama 6 hari Di Aston Cengkareng. Hal yang berkesan bagi saya adalah variasi sarapan yang banyak, sehingga kami dapat memilih makanan yang diinginkan dari makanan daerah sampai makanan internasional. Hal lain adalah ruangan tempat acara yang terletak di Lantai Dasar yang sangat dingin, kadang terpaksa dimatikan dulu, setelah agak panas baru dihidupkan lagi. Yang juga pantas diacungi jempol adalah kecepatan teknis yang dipanggil memperbaiki lampu kamar mandi dan kamar dalam 2 hari, dengan cepat memperbaiki lampu yang rusak. Kamarnya bersih.. Kelebihan yang lain tersedia antar jemput dari Bandara Soekarno Hatta secara gratis.
Bravo Aston Cengkareng. Tetap tingkatkan pelayanan.
title: Sarapan dengan berbagai Variasi

text:
Saya bertamu di tgl 8/10-2017. Pada saat itu saya book, krn di hari itu pernikahan sahabat saya di ballroom nya, jadi kami book kamar untuk berias bersama. Kami dapat di kamar 336, teman saya yang sudah sampai terlebih dahulu disana, lalu saya datang menyusul. Laporan pertama datang, drainase air kamar mandi nya tidak lancar dan AC terasa panas.
Dari sini saya mereview hotel ini. 
Aston, bisa terbilang bintang 3+, dengan interior yang cukup berkelas, cukup banyak pemakaian granit dan marmer di dalam hotelnya, lalu ballroom yang mumpuni, dan ruang meeting atau ruang sewa yang sangat baik. Kesediaan Lift dan kualitasnya pun sangat baik.
Tetapi yang namanya hotel, itu pasti yang di jual adalah kamar nya. 
Saya paling konsern di area tempat tidur dan kamar mandi jika memasuki sebuah kamar hotel, apalagi hotel dengan harga 450rb ke atas. Bahkan hampir menyentuh angka 600rb saat dibelinya si kamar ini.

Kembali ke kmr 336, saat saya mandi, air mulai banjir di menit ke 5 saya mandi, tidak turun sampai harus saya buka tutup drainasenya, tetapi tidak menolong juga. Saya mandi hanya sekitar 8-9mnt. Setelah berberes, saya keluar ke bagian telepon hotel yang disediakan dikamar, dan telphone nya tidak nyala (alias mati total). Saya harus keluar kamar, laporan dengan resepsionist di Lobby (lantai D). 

Sampai di Lobby (rambut saya masih basah, belum sempat dikeringkan dll), resepsionistnya (perempuan sekitar 40++) suruh saya nunggu untuk berbicara sama dia, krn dia lagi mencatat sesuatu. Saya disini tidak tau brp jumlah pegawai resepsionist yg dipekerjakan di sini, yg jelas terlihat banyak pegawai yg mondar mandir tp belaga buta. Jujur aja saya disini mulai emosi sih. Sudah emosi ditambah emosi. 
Setelah nunggu 5mnt, baru saya di tanya ada perlu apa.....? 
Saya cerita kalau kamar mandi saya airnya bermasalah di pembuangan, di kmr 336. Saya ingin pindah kamar saja, karena saya buru2 harus merias diri. (udah jam 6 sore, nikahan jam 7)
*oh.. iya nanti kami panggilkan bagian ME untuk periksa ke sana, silahkan tunggu di kamar..* (respon macam apa ini)

Di kamar, org ME dtg, lalu mempompa saluran drainasenya, hingga kluar air dan kotoran2 hitam, kamar mandi jadi kotor banget. Dan sepatu bekas kamar mandi, mau di pake nginjak2 1 ruang kamar, krn mau benerin telepon mati tadinya. (oh crab!)

Saya langsung minta pindah kamar, diberi di kamar 337 (sebrangnya persis).
Ini better, AC dingin, kamar mandi better. Lebih tenang lha hidupnya 1 malam.

Masuk ke jenis perlengkapan kamar.
Bed dan linen yg di gunakan merk Serta (ini merk dari King Koil tetapi lebih murah), biasa banget matrass nya.
Curtain, saya rasa karena kamar saya berhadapan dengan jendela kamar lain, jadi ga ngaruh. Antara dia Dim-out curtain atau Black-out curtain, yang jelas gelap sepanjang hari.
Lantai - Full Keramik, harusnya bintang 3, stghnya karpet.
Kulkas + AC, produk lama banget. Tidak bisa setel suhu dan terlihat kotor.
Teko Elektricnya pun rusak tombol on-off. musti sambil dipegangin kalau mau berfungsi. (merk JVD)
Untuk Furniture, ya so-so lha..

Kamar mandi, Shower (hot-cool water), Glass door area showernya.
Toiletnya ga bs flush, musti di semprot air sendiri buat bersihin.
Wastafell, ini cukup mewah, dari Granit, tapi kusam.
Amenitis nya biasa aja. Sabun cuci tangan, perlengkapan sikat gigi, sabun mandi, shampoo, Shower cap.

Sekian review saya.
thx yang sudah membaca.
title: Perlu di Renovasi.

text: Kamar bersih-Sarapan pagi OK-tenang-Dekat dengan bandara.-bila ingin makan di luar Juga Gampang,  Anda mau pergi kemana di jakarta--->armada taksi akan mengantar anda sampai ketujuan-dengan ARGO yang tidak perlu di ragukan lagi. Pelayanan pak sopir juga bagus.
title: SEMALAM DI ASTON CENGKARENG.

text:
sudah beberapa lama saya penasaran dengan hotel aston di cengkareng ini karena setiap saya mau pesan selalu penuh.
akhirnya kemarin saya dapat memesan 1 kamar.
hotel ini dari mulai pemesanan pun bintangnya membingungkan. menurut tripadvisor dan booking.com,hotel ini berbintang 4, tetapi menurut agoda.com dan traveloka, hotel ini berbintang 3.

sangatlah tidak layak jika hotel ini disebut berbintang 4, bahkan utk bintang 3 pun hanya di kelas rata2.

kelebihan :
- lift cukup mudah dan cepat didapat
- parkir basement mudah dan dekat (tapi mungkin karena memang sedang sepi pengunjung)

kekurangan :
- tidak ada welcome drink
- ada anak kecoa di kamar
- hotel terasa kurang bersih
- hotel terasa agak tua. terasa dari model keramik yang ada, lift yang tidak modern dan juga sistem kartu di kamar
- ac agak kurang dingin
- makanan bervariasi, tetapi lebih ke arah makanan tradisional indonesia, walaupun ada sedikit makanan barat seperti french fries. jadi jika selera anda lebih ke makanan internasional, mungkin kurang cocok
- yang paling mengesalkan adalah adanya pengunjung (di foto) yang merokok di restorannya yang ber ac. padahal ada tempat duduk di luar restoran untuk yang mau merokok. dia duduk di sana lama dari kami datang hingga selesai (padahal mengingat kami membawa anak-anak yang makannya lama bisa sampai sejam). dan sudah saya laporkan ke pegawai aston, tetapi hingga kami selesai tidak ada pegawai yang berani menegur bapak tersebut. sangat mengecewakan.

untuk harganya yang cukup mahal (sebanding dengan hotel berbintang 4), pelayanan, mutu, kualitas, kenyamanan yang diberikan aston hanyalah bintang 3, dan utk bintang 3 pun masih berada di bawah dibanding beberapa hotel bintang 3 lainnya
title: hotel yang tidak sesuai harga dibanding mutunya

Pelayanan Hotel bagus & cepat. Saya sering mendapatkan kamar yg dinaikkan kelasnya karena kamar yg saya booking penuh pada saat check in.
Tersedia Wi-Fi gratis & kencang di dalam kamar.

text: pelayanan cukup memuaskan, kamar bersih, tempat tidur nyaman, lokasi cukup strategis. tempat parkir luas. secara keluruhan sudah bagus sekali. hanya sayang, untuk menu breakfastnya, tidak sesuai dengan brand aston yang sudah terkenal.

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: Menginap di Aston Cengkareng 28-31 Oktober cukup terkesan dengan letak hotel yang jauh dari kebisingan. Ruko di skitar hotel tidak begitu ramai, dan dekat dengan mall sehingga tidak kesulitan mencari kebutuhan. Transportasi umum cukup jauh, tetapi ada taksi yang siap antar ke berbagai lokasi. Kamar cukup bersih, tetapi sinyal hp tidak bagus untuk ruangan dasar dan kamar-kamar. Beberapa kamar tidak punya view, sehingga lebih baik pesan kamar dulu sebelum datang.

text: Saya menginap di Aston Cengkareng sebelum penerbangan siang saya. Karena malas menghadapi kemacetan siang hari, sekalian saja saya pesan kamar di Aston sehari sebelumnya karena saya ingin mencoba shuttle nya. Resepsionis bekerja dengan cepat, kamar nyaman dan kasur empuk. Sayang lokasinya memang berada di area yang gersang jadi untuk berjalan2 di malam hari keluar hotel pun malas. text:

View dari kamar hotel yg kurang oke, TV sbg alat hiburan dan informasi yg kurang oke (saluran tv kabelnya banyak yang ber-semut/kasar), rasa makanannya yang standar2 aja (harga wow banget), Sarapan pagi tempatnya juga kurang oke. Yang oke cuma Wifinya aja, sehingga kalo masih ada keperluan yang harus diselesaikan melalui hubungan internet dapat terpenuhi.
Sehingga kalo sesuai judul review saya.. Hotel ini hanya betul2 sebagai hotel singgah yang sama dengan konsep2 hotel singgah tak berbintang sekalipun.

text: Hotelnya bagus untuk standard di kota Jakarta. Namun resepsionisnya tdk begitu ramah. Kamar tidur sedikit sempit. Kamar mandi bersih dna bagus. Interior hotel standard kebanyakan hotel Aston di Indonesia

text:

text: datang dari airport dijemput tepat waktu pake shuttle aston. ini satu2 nya fasilitas yg recommend untuk aston. saya datang bersama keluarga. suami dan 2 anak. namanya anak2, mereka sangat excited dgn hotel bermain, beretriak, menangis juga. herannya kamar sebelah bisa mendengar suara yg ribut itu. mungkin dinding aston terlalu tipis. lantai aston juga tidak berkarpet. akhirnya kami merasa bersalah dan menyuruh anak kami diam. setelah tiba tengah malam dgn rasa capek, kami akhirnya tertidur dan dibangunkan oleh suara tidak dikenal. ada bule nyasar menggedor gedor pintu kami. "good morning , have a nice day, good bye" . gedoran pintu yg cukup mengagetkan. hufff. kamar yg kecil. untuk hotel dekat airport hotel ini juga tidak terlalu dekat sekali. 30 menit.

text: Minggu ini kebetulan ada meeting nasional dengan beberapa kolega dari seluruh indonesia, dan diputuskan lah untuk memilih Hotel ini karena tidak jauh dari bandara dan memudahkan peserta lain yang dari luar kota ketika turun dari pesawat untuk menghindari kejamnya lalulintas Jakarta. Hotel ini cukup nyaman, kamarnya bersih dan cukup memadai. Breakfast nya enak dan variatif. text:
Saya berkunjung dan menginap di hotel ini dalam rangka transit untuk penerbangan Internasional keesokan harinya.
Lokasinya dekat dengan airport Soekarno Hatta, dan menyediakan Shuttle bus utk antar dan jemput tamu2 hotel meskipun harus mengikuti jadwal.
Yg jd keluhan adalah kemacetan lalu lintas di jalanan menuju hotel.. Pada saat itu waktu cek in saya mmg berdekatan jam sibuk di jalan raya dekat hotel.
Anda tidak perlu kuatir jika malam hari anda belum makan malam, karena 300 meter dari hotel ada komplek ruko dimana banyak penjual aneka ragam masakan dan sebuah mini market utk memenuhi selera anda.

Makan pagi menurut saya sih terlalu standar ya.. tapi lumayan untuk hanya sekadar sarapan.

Luas kamar tidak terlalu besar namun ya tidak sempit. masih nyaman utk pasangan suami istri dengan 1 anak dibawah 3 th utk tidur sekamar.
title: Hotel bisnis & transit dengan fasilitas lengkap.

text:
Hotel ini saya pesan untuk kebutuhan wedding saya dimana diperlukan sekitar 20 kamar, awal pemesanan agak merepotkan karena request saya utk all no smoking room tdk bisa dipastikan sampai hari H, tapi mereka tetap mengusahakan dimana pada hari H keluarga saya datang ke hotel ini. Semua request saya utk no smoking room dpt dipenuhi.

Kemudian dari segi breakfast untuk hotel kelas bintang 3 saya sangat puas, karena enak, namun sayangnya untuk pemesanan makanan di restoran hotel sekitar jam 3 sore dimana keluarga saya yang baru datang saya minta untuk makan disana. perlu 1 jam lebih menunggu untuk makanan dapat keluar semua.

Segi kamar, simple dan cocok untuk bisnis dan tinggal sementara. tetapi yang terutama WC bersih sehingga nyaman untuk ditempati
Lokasinya dekat dengan Mall Taman Palem, dan mereka menyediakan Free Shuttle ke Bandara meskipun agak aneh menurut saya, dimana jam keberangkatan telah ditentukan, sehingga meskipun rombongan yang datang dari keluarga saya cukup banyak. Tapi tidak ada dispensasi khusus untuk penjemputannya. Sehingga saya tidak memakai fasilitas dari hotel ini.

Terima kasih
Anthony S
title: Cocok untuk bisnis & Group Stay di Cengkareng

text:
Saya menginap disini selama 10 hari dari tanggal 9-13 Juli dan 16-20 Juli. Selama 5 hari pertama saya berada di lantai 1 menghadap ke jalan utama. Tidak ada gangguan sama sekali. Kamarnya baik kecuali bahwa toiletnya tidak terlalu bersih. Restoran buka selama 24 jam dan saya mencoba beberapa kali makan malam. Makanannya enak.

Lima hari berikutnya saya pindah ke lantai 5, tepat 1 lantai di bawah ruang serbaguna. Ruang tersebut berfungsi selama seminggu penuh dan biasanya acara selesai cukup larut malam. Sehingga tidur saya terganggu pada pukul 2 malam selama beberapa hari. Di hari ketiga saya, pintu kamar mandi terkunci dari dalam tetapi petugas perawatan segera memperbaikinya. Di hari terakhir saya, terdapat air yang menetes dari langit-langit. Untungnya saya sudah hampir check out pada saat itu.

Pergilah ke ruang spa Delta dan anda berhak mendapatkan diskon sebesar 20%. Tempatnya bersih. Pelayanannya sempurna. Layak untuk anda kunjungi.
title: Saya kembali ke Aston Cengkareng untuk kedua kalinya

text:
Pengalaman saya terhadap lalu lintas Jakarta membuat saya mencari hotel yang dekat dengan bandara, jadi saya memilih hotel ini. Selain itu, tersedia kendaraan shuttle hotel gratis setiap 2 jam ke bandara dan saat Anda tiba di suatu tempat yang jauh dari rumah, menyenangkan mendapati wajah ramah menyapa Anda dan memastikan Anda sampai ke hotel tanpa masalah.
Hotel ini berlokasi di sebuah area yang relatif baru di Jakarta, jadi tidak banyak yang bisa dilihat di sini. Jadi benar-benar hanya fungsional. Pusat perbelanjaan di seberang jalan sedang dalam kesulitan. Bila Anda ingin berbelanja, lebih baik Anda mencoba tempat lain seperti Puti Inda.
Hotel ini sudah tua dan ada beberapa masalah dengan kamar saya. Air panasnya hanya suam-suam kuku tapi bisa diperbaiki dengan segera. Lampu tidurnya tidak bisa dimatikan dan lagi, bisa diperbaiki. Kamar mandinya kecil dan kurang nyaman. Tidak ada gorden di kamar mandi. Saya memerlukan kursi sederhana untuk duduk dan membaca.
Begitulah, bila Anda hanya memerlukan tempat untuk tidur, hotel ini sudah cukup. Makan paginya istimewa dan termasuk dalam harga kamar sementara makanan lain harganya sesuai. Stafnya sangat ramah dan membantu.
title: Fungsional dan ramah

text:
Kami terbang dari Australia ke Jakarta, berhenti di hotel semalam untuk meneruskan perjalanan keesokan harinya.

Hotel ini memenuhi kebutuhan kami dengan sangat baik. Kamarnya bersih dan nyaman. Stafnya ramah dan mau membantu saat kami ingin melihat-lihat Jakarta di wilayah ini dan menunjukkan tempat makan. Pemandangan dari kamar kami sangat bagus dan membantu kami melihat kota Jakarta bagian ini dan beberapa tempat penting.

Telepon untuk membangunkan kami di pagi hari dan sarapan dalam kotak. Kami diberi pilihan sarapan hidangan Indonesia atau continental.

Kami tidak membongkar koper, jadi kami sangat senang mendapatkan barang kecil seperti 2 sikat gigi (hotel lain menyiapkan 1 atau tidak sama sekali) dll.

Kedekatan dengan Bandara membuat masalah kemacetan lalu lintas Jakarta diminimalisir.

Kami senang untuk menginap di sana lagi nanti.
title: Menginap semalam dekat Bandara

text:
Hotel yang bagus, dengan fasilitas yang lengkap ditunjang dengan service yg kurang ramah . membuat hotel ini terkesan mahal bagi saya. Saya memilih aston karena satan seorang teman yang memang pernah puas dengan pelayanan ASTON yang terbilang cukup beken 

Semoga pihak managemen bisa meningkatkan pelayanan nya agar tamu2 yang datang puas

text:
We chose this place because of its name, Aston, even there are lots of hotel closer to the airport. But we got really dissapointed of many things:
1. They didn't greet me or even try to offer me help to carry my suitcase. In fact, they just looked at me until I get to the reception desk.
2. The room is not clean, the light is low and the interior is bad, the floor has stain that looks like dirt. 
3. The bathroom even worse, dirty and looks old. The towel is discusting, blood stain on it. They don't provide bar soap unless you ask for it.
4. Bad breakfast: not too various as any other Aston have, and the taste is worst.

They don't deserve the label as Aston or 4 star hotel, even 3 star hotel. This is terrible. 

I went to many hotels but this one is the most dissapointing.
title: The worst aston ever

text:
managed to have immediate business around Daan Mogot, we decided to book this hotel. I've read TripAdvisor previously, and someone saying that there is NO NON-SMOKING ROOM in this hotel. We did not expect it was that bad. 
We book this hotel through Agoda in the same day we checked in. We've been into hotels across Indonesia and Asia, and we know that this hotel chain is quite good. 

From the arrival, do not expect there is hospitality like doorman say greeting to you. There was only one security who is busy helping you bringing your luggage and guarding the door.
Do not expect a bright, airy, fresh, and homey hotel. When entering the reception at 17:00, the atmosphere was dark, damp, and have intense perfume smell. 

We were assigned to a room. When we were inside, cigarette smell was so intense like it's choking you. It seems that the room was previously occupied by a heavy smoker. After he left, the hotel does not allow the room to be aerated and they shut the door immediately. One hour there, we start to concern the healthy of our 9 months daughter. We called reception and they agreed to provide another room within 15 minutes. 

No call from reception until 15 minutes. I decided to call him and they said that the room is being prepared. We asked to see the room first. They brought us to the new room to see. They put a big, boxy, noisy thing they called it air purifier. It diffuses a weird odor to the entire room. OK, we chose to move.

We get out for some business at 19:00 and returned at 22:00. The odor from the purifier starts to stick into every plastics things we brought. At 00:00, we pack our bags, check out, and looking for another hotel.

Pros:
- location. It is situated between Daan Mogot and the airport. It is also nearby a lot of hawker food stalls. Beware of non-halal foods there.
- staff is quite attentive. They are reliable to serve when you need something.

Cons:
- air circulation inside the property is dreadful.
- air quality in the neighborhood is not so good.

Sorry Aston, we were disappointed.
title: Beware when you bring your children

text: I choose this hotel as they say as airport hotel. They provide the guests free transfer to airport show them as airport hotel. However, I feel the hotel is weak on their maintenance and cleanliness or something went wrong on the design. A bit dark: or probably because I was check-in in the evening? My room view was another wall, seems that another room? As they put a flier on massage, I was asking where is the spa but unfortunately they said it is only for man; which mean not good for me. When I booked. Breakfast was good on this hotel level. Front Office staff was great also the restaurant reception. This hotel is just okey for your transit before airport.

text:
The "Aston Cengkareng City Hotel", which I stayed at from August 21st to August 31st, is located in a place far from the center of the city, Jakarta. It takes about 25 minutes from Jakarta , but it is close to the airport as well as a big shopping center, and costs 4000 yen per a day. This was my first time visiting your hotel. The reason why I stayed at this hotel for about 10 days is that the person in charge of the flight attendant training had decided for our group to stay there. However, I think your hotel is one of the best hotels in Indonesia.  
    First of all I was surprised at the hotel is a excellent staff. When I asked them to bring a hairdryer to my room, a man in the staff-room brought one so quickly, maybe took him in about 5 minutes. My roommate and I were very surprised and became to be happy. Furthermore, the room staff changed the used bed seats to new one everyday. We could feel everyday was like it was the wonderful first day of this trip. They were delightful people and made us feel pleased, so we were able to take off our fatigue.
    The second satisfying thing I was so impressed with was about the delicious food. In the morning, we chose any kinds of food what we like, such as spicy rice, bread, soup, many kinds of fruits, and so on. Moreover, in the evening, we could eat marvelous traditional Indonesian food all time we stayed. The menu was changed every day, so that we didn't get tired of hotel dinners. Although the natural water of Indonesia couldn’t be drunk for us, this hotel prepared boiled water to drink something. So I didn't have to afraid the water thanks to hospitality mind of the staff.  
    The last feature I like was the room. The room which is my friend and I stayed in for 10 days was a very comfortable place for us to spend our time. We watched TV channel about 65 from around the world. The air conditioner was equipped on the ceiling, so that we felt a cool and had a superb time, even though it was the summer season. Moreover, we could use a refrigerator for free which was lucky for us. On the other hand, the bathroom was terrible, because it was difficult for us to change the temperature of the shower, and there was no bathtub in the bathroom. There was just a shower.  Actually, I wanted to take a bath. 
    I can really recommend this hotel to all people who have a plan to go to Indonesia. I think all Indonesian people in this hotel are very very awesome and give hospitality mind to guests. When we ask staff about that we were confused with something, they acted so speedly. This Aston Cengkareng City Hotel has many impressive points such as staffs, foods, rooms, amenities, environments, and so on. However I was shocked because there was not a bathtub. Totally I give four-stars to this hotel. I want my friends or my family to use this hotel when they go to Indonesia.
title: This hotel is amazing ! I like it.

text:
Pulling up we thought, wow, our guide was wrong that it would be the worst place we stayed at during out trip to Indonesia! A lovely lobby (but what is that smell?) friendly staff, and nice decor and arrangement. Quick check-in. Three elevators available, so that was good. We got to our floor and painters were painting, but that was okay because it masked the odd smell. We got to our rooms and every room was smoking...so that explained the smell. Ugh, but okay. However, the room floor felt dirty (sheets were clean) the doors were dirty, the marble countertop was waterstained, the shower walls were stained, the grouting was gross, the waste-basket was dirty. We decided to spend as little time as possible in the room. 
We looked around for a different place to eat, but were tired so decided to have dinner in the hotel. The food was good, but the staff seemed unused to serving meals so dining was an odd experience. Beer was 890,000 IPR, and I had thought that at that price it was fair to expect a higher level of service. 
This hotel could use a deep cleaning, and then I would rate it two notches higher.

text:
Spent just one night there with my wife, after flying from Yogyakarta and leaving Indonesia next afternoon. We decided to stay away from central Jakarta and Aston Cengkareng sounded like a reasonable option, especially compared to the Jakarta Airport Hotel.

If you plan to do touristy things in Jakarta, you should rather look for an option closer to its center. 

The good: The prices are reasonable, especially in comparison to JAH. Looks new and very clean, very modern. Our room was very clean too, with the most comfortable bed we've slept in during our 3 weeks stay in Indonesia. Lots of TV channels, probably important if you're travelling for business purposes and just want to stay in hotel. Breakfast was included in the price, buffet, quite good although a bit too Asian-style for a Western-style hotel (just a thought. Good anyway). Comfy transport to/from the airport included in the price, although check up on availability. In September 2010 the buses/minibuses would go to the airport every two hours.

The "meh": our bathroom seemed like it was getting old already, for some strange reason - and we're talking about a new hotel here. Please read newer reviews once this becomes 1 year old. 

The ugly: although receptionists were very nice, only some of them spoke satisfactory English, but that's just complaining. Other staff was either disinterested (waiters at hotel restaurant) or unprofessional (after checking out the housekeeping staff sort of accused us of stealing the bath mat... we pay 60 USD/night and they dare to point out a bath mat is missing? Go figure).

This way or another, we recommend it. Just don't get your hopes up - this place promises more than it delivers. Simple as that.
title: Conveniently placed for 1 night, reasonable price, has issues

text:
For USD 50, we got a nice clean room, a very comfortable bed, and a good breakfast.
The staffs are polite and helpful. Free airport transportation is provided at certain times, so 
contact the hotel before hand regarding the schedule. Because we arrived really late, we took taxi ( 15 min. trip, cost about Rp 67,000 or USD 8.- including toll fees).
title: A solid establishment for a layover in Jakarta (Airport)

text:
We only stayed in this hotel for one night between flights. The location was ideal as it is fairly close to the airport.
Even better, the hotel offer a FREE shuttle service to and from the airport. We let them know our flight number and the shuttle bus driver was waiting for us as we arrived. We also got the shuttle bus back to the airport the following morning.
There is nothing much to do in the area around the hotel, but we did find  a little cafe down the road and the staff were really friendly.
The rooms are well furnished and clean (unusual in Indonesia!) The hotel was really quiet at night and we slept very well. The free breakfast was superb, with plenty to choose from in a buffet style.
title: Convenient for airport

text:
We booked this hotel for a 10 hour layover in Jakarta, based on three criteria:

1) price
2) proximity to Soekarno-Hatta Airport 
3) free airport transportation

The hotel was great on all three.  

- Price was $41 USD for a double room, including breakfast.  There's a breakfast buffet, or if your flight is early (we left at 6 am), they will pack a breakfast to go.

- Location:  the hotel is about 9 km, or a 15 minute drive from the airport.  It's a great location for an overnight layover (we arrived at 9 pm and flew out the next morning at 8 am), but not so great for exploring the city.  If you have a few hours to kill, there's a big shopping mall a few minutes walk from the hotel.  If you're in Jakarta for a few days though, you'd be better off heading into the city.

- Transport:  A driver from the hotel was waiting for us at the airport;  we walked out of customs and straight into the car.  That was great.  The next morning, we took the 6 am shuttle back to the airport.  It only took about 15 minutes each way.

The rooms were great.  We booked the standard room, and were happy with it. The rooms (and hotel) are brand-spanking-new.  Very nice room, with a plasma TV, big bathroom, spotlessly clean.  Very comfortable bed.  Big walk-in shower with lots of hot water and good water pressure (great for Asia - no wet bathroom!!).  They even give you slippers.

24 hour room service was good, and reasonably priced. 

Some drawbacks - there was no hairdryer and, when I used mine (a small and not very powerful travel hairdryer), I blew a circuit breaker, and had to go down to the front desk to have them flip the power back on.

Apart from that, a great little hotel for the price, for a short layover.
title: great hotel for an overnight layover in Jakarta

We booked a connecting junior suite, upon arrival we were placed in two seperated rooms. Since  we are travelling with kids this was not an  option, after several calls we were placed in the bunker of the hotel, without access to light or fresh air........ 

Every meal we have had was cold and did not contain every item that was listed on the menu. After four days we were finally moved again to a room with  fresh air. The general manager did not have the time to address our complaints, we were not worthy of his time i guess. We travel a lot but never encountered  something like this.

The only pleasant thing I can mention is that the staff was very friendly and helpfull, when they lost our laundry they did everything to retrieve it.
title: Where  to start...... our 10-day quarantine experience.

text:
This hotel has all the necessities including toothbrushes. They only provide one pair of slippers but we requested for another pair when we realised upon checking in. There’s a complimentary transfer from the airport with a 2hr interval. The dustbin however is very dirty which is spoilt the image from the rest of the furniture. The bed is also very soft which will shake when your partner move. Try to choose a twin bed. Also ask for rooms facing outside.
The breakfast spread is great with local, western and japanese sushi to choose from. It also has an egg and pancake section.
This hotel is also near to a supermarket which is a 3min walk. There’s also a row of eateries at night on the opposite side of the road.
Overall this is a nice hotel to stay in although it is a bit run down but is clean.

text:
Booked this hotel for being close to the airport which is mere 25minutes drive.

Stayed :20th October
Booked via agoda
Room was initially given 108 and moved to 105

Lobby : As you enter the hotel you can feel that the hotel is old with cigarette smell and with run down furniture's.

Check in experience: 
Check in took by a lady for about 15minutes, she was quite aggressive and had to argue with the deposit and paid for the room charges.
Not friendly enough and they speak limited English.

Guest lift: Was very slow and used by staff for carrying the kitchen items and never bothered about guest.

Room: Was given 108 initially and found that the TV remote was not working,Wifi not getting connected and tried for almost 30minutes and very slow,can make out that the bed sheets was reused from previous guest stay,you can find the old diety coffee/tea kettle,bathroom was not clean. After finding experiencing all these called reception to fix this a person came and took 15mnts and finally agreed to move to room 105 when I stated that I have to speak to the hotel general manager.

Room 105 was decent room.

In room dining: They cannot understand English at all, ordered for a kiwi juice and a Indonesian dish which was pretty expensive for this hotel..Less options in the menu.

Corridor: Noisy as the room is next to guest lift of people walking around.

Breakfast: Not good and limited options

Check out: Was handled smoothly

Booked own car from outside to reach airport,.

Overall: Please don't book this hotel as they don't know the meaning of hospitality and not worth it for wat you spend..And I'm sure you will have the same disappointing experience as I had.
title: Never Ever Book this old hotel!

text: Everything is good and people are friendly. The room is quite clean and the receptionist is really nice but the laundry is not so good. My clothes still remain some dirts after laundry. text: We checked in almost midnight for a quick snooze and have to go early in the morning, the price is around 45$ for a superior room and king size bed, not bad for the size of the room and the bed. It fits 3 adults. But if cigarette smoke is your worst nightmare and this hotel will make it come true, welcome to the most smelliest hotel or perhaps sleaziest motel I've entered. We booked through a travel website and didn't really aware of the condition. Yes it have shuttle bus to airport and near the airport but we never knew this Aston could be so rotten. Entering the lobby just like entering a night club or cheap bar, smoky, smelly and seriously not fit for an Aston and the stars? It's a big joke. We regret booking the room the minute we enter the lobby. There are no smoking or non smoking room here, all are smoking arena and like a contest which floor smells the worst. The air circulation is a hazard here, too poor. The hotel need to open the windows or do better with purificating the air. The check in staff didn't even care, he said all of our rooms and floors are the same. Inside the room? The floor is dusty, no carpet, and the beddings smells like they were washed using cigarette buts, even the pillows and blankets are like infused with smoke. It's unberable. The toilet can not be flush, the aircon is so noisy and produce almost nothing, we are sweating even thou we use no blanket and the temp are set to the lowest, it was the worst. And there's this continuous smell from the aircon that so awful. If they dont bother clean things we can see like floors, they'll never pay attention the the cleanliness of the air con for sure. If you hate your lungs, do stay here. And bonus point, Aside from the liveless pillows, there this cockcroach scent here and there. Early in the morning without taking a shower using a powdery like towels, we ran checking out as fast as we could. Didn't bother to look back. Aside from the horror, I do notice the 2 bottled water, tea and coffee maker, very basic toiletries and tv that we never turned on. So it the hygienic issue and the quality of the air...which for me, it's the sole reasons of a hotel should be. Some say this is a poor run down hotel, for me, it's more like they gave up managing the hotel. In the morning, the ambiance is a bit brighter thanks to the sun, but the smell of the smoke? Still there!
title: Worst one ever

text:
Stayed at Aston Cengkareng for 4 nights from March 1, during my recent trip to Jakarta. I must say that my stay was very pleasant and memorable. Clean spacious room, good food, great service, an extremely helpful front desk, clean location, unlimited wifi - these are some of the merits that made my experience in this hotel an enthralling one. Another quality worth mentioning is that the hotel is the hub of Blue Bird Taxis [the only taxi company that I found trustworthy in Jakarta]. It just needs a minute for the hotel concierge to arrange a taxi for you. I would recommend this hotel highly for both family and business travellers.
PS: Just to add that because I had to check out early to catch a morning flight, the hotel insisted on providing me packed sandwiches as I had to miss my complementary breakfast. A small gesture that speaks highly about the way guests are treated here.
title: AN ENTHRALLING EXPERIENCE

text:
So, I had high hopes for this place based off the reviews I read here.. unfortunately.. not so. I stayed for 2 nights en route to the Soekarno Hatta Int'l Airport. I stayed in room 205 and it was HORRID! Although, because it was a corner room, it had a decent view of the streets. First off, as I arrived, there was a napkin laying in front of my room door (what looks like a napkin from the previous occupant's room service). I kicked it aside and forgot about it. Then the bathroom was nasty! The toilet has some black stuff and crusty brown stuff like someone had just pooped and it was never cleaned up. The sink was dirty. Soap scumb film and other brown stuff crusted in. There was some black stuff in the corner of the room to which I wasn't about to investigate what it was. The shower looked clean enough until I took a shower. Then the water didn't drain. By the time I was done showering, the floor all the way out to the sink was flooded. The safe deposit box didn't work. If I push number 2, the display says 1, if I push 4, the display says 6. 
I called and complained, and asked for a different room. The receptionist said that she will "try" to get me a supervisor to get a new room. I don't like the word "try" at the moment, so I told them I would get a new room or I will check out. She said she will send someone to fix the drain and will have a supervisor called me. Someone did come and fix the drain within 10 minutes, but supervisor never called back. Exhausted for the day. I opted to just turn the lights off and go to sleep. The bed was, fortunately, "seemed" clean and was comfortable. 
The next morning, I still didn't get a call from the supervisor, so I went down to talk to receptionist in person. I had taken pictures and showed the supervisor all that ailed me. He apologized and upgraded me to the Jr.Suite. They gave me the key card and left. No one helped us move my luggage so I had to do it myself. 
The new room is cleaner, but the view sucks. OK. fine. I'll take clean over view. The sink still has the soap scumb film which the supervisor assured me "it's just the way it is, but it is clean" when I called. There is a DVD in the room, which unfortunately kept giving me error message regardless of various DVDs I put in. Upon use, the toilet top had to be jiggled each time so the water wouldn't run. OK, so I start to sound nit picky at this point. I agree, but for Rp 600,000/night (and it's a lot of money in Jakarta), although I don't expect a 5 star hotel, I expect to not see soap scumb and have a working toilet. Is that too much to ask?  2 rooms, 2 disappointments. Would not recommend this place to anyone.
title: UGH! Nasty.

text:
This big, business-style hotel is more used to accommodating Chinese businessmen than European backpackers and is generally used by guests staying for just one or two nights during their Jakarta stop-over.

We chose the hotel because of its proximity to the airport and for the free airport shuttle. Even though the airport is just a 20 minute drive away, the shuttle saves having to look for, and pay for, taxis after a long flight when all you want to do is sleep.

The room was very nice and very comfortable with a big double bed. The free wifi was excellent in all areas. The buffet breakfast was amazing with more choice than you could ever imagine: eastern, western and everything in between.

In the bar the drinks were very expensive by Indonesian standards, but there was a pleasant atmosphere and live music.

The staff in the main reception were extremely slow and quite clueless at times - not very professional but friendly and welcoming. They asked us if we wanted a wake-up call. We said 05:15. They called one room at 05:30 and the other room is still sleeping.

A few things were over-looked in the room: there was no toilet paper; the water escaped from the shower cubicle soaking the bathroom.

Things to note: the hotel does not accept or exchange foreign currency. Breakfast is between 05:00 and 10:00. 

Tip: For food and drink in the evening go out of the hotel to the street food places on the other side of the roundabout and mix with the locals.
title: Free Airport Shuttle

text:
This is a good hotel not far from the airport. They offer a free shuttle service from/to the airport, but it only runs every couple of hours, The last one is at eleven, our plane was delayed so I had to get there by taxi. 
The lobby is very elegant and breakfast is great with a wide selection of both eastern and western food.
The room are less impressive, but they are large and clean.
the surrounding area offers a few places where to eat and a shopping centre which only five minutes walk.
title: good hotel near the airport

text:
I was traveling with a group of 8 and we had stayed three nights at the Aston hotel in Cirebon -- wonderful! We were expecting something similar in Jarkarta. But this Aston doesn't even seem to belong in the same chain.  It felt pokey and dirty.  There were no non-smoking rooms or areas -- the smell of smoke was everywhere. The food left a lot to be desired. Several things on the menu were not available and the service, while pleasant and well-meaning, was not very competent. 

Though it calls itself City Hotel, don't be mistaken.  Cengkareng is quite distant from the centre of the city.  It took us more than two hours in traffic to get there from the main railway station.  It is relatively close to the airport, but not so close that you could be really confident of arriving there in less than an hour -- traffic is always a wild-card.  
If you're looking for a hotel near the airport, I'd recommend the FM7 Resort Hotel. I stayed there twice and it's very nice.
title: You don't really want to stay here -- unless you like the smell of smoke

I stayed here with family and I thought the rooms were quite big but a little dated. The bathroom especially could have done with a make-over or at least updating. The toilets had stains and the grout in the showers were dirty. The beds were okay. There wasn't much you could do with the air con though, it wasn't adjustable apart of low, medium and high. 

The hotel either has some in-house karaoke, or is located right next to some load karaoke as we could get the undertones of bass level music (I think till about 1-2am). Luckily I had y iPod with me so I just drowned out the music but I could imagine it might bother some people.

There also seemed to be a lot of confusion with the hotel reception staff who we always had to beg every morning for a breakfast coupon that we paid for. However when you did get to the breakfast there seemed to be a lot on offer (avoid the pre-toasted toast, I saw some bugs on it)

Overall not sure I would stay here, it was convenient because our family was nearby but traffic is horrific in Jakarta so I'm sure no matter where we stayed there would have been issues getting around.

text:

The food that they're serving is also good. :)
title: Very comfortable

text:
Yes, you read my title correct. I actually ended up booking the wrong place at first, thinking this might be by best option to work at Kuningan City and Tangerang area. But I was totally wrong when Aston Cengkareng is actually away from the busy/noisy/ Jakarta. But to be honest I never felt peacefull enought staying here and never a minute I worried about travelling 30mins on the road to both Kuningan South and Tangerang area. Oh yeah, I actually came down for work.  The location of this hotel is best for away from city and layovers. 

About the hotel now, I never stayed in Aston hotels before thou we have 1 in Langkawi. I heard about Delta Spa's in Jakarta but NEVER THOUGHT it will be like 1 minute walk from the hotel. It's just next door and you are entitled for 20% DISCOUNT!! How good is that? Yes, :P, the next minute after checking in I went for a massage. 

You got a option to get a non-smoke or smoke room, I was alone so deluxe was a perfect option for me. Beds are clean, TV channels works fine, my view was the road beside the hotel and wasn't noisy as I thought it would be. Well only the shower cubicle was small for me to scrub my whole body, wasn't spacious enough. I'm well build and 6foot!! Water temperature was perfect. 

Wifi had a good speed, hotel's bar was the only place I have spend my new year. The hotel foods were great no complaints and kitchen opens 24/7. If you aren't into hotel foods, there is a Nasi Padang shop just beside the Hotel which I never noticed up till I checked out. I'm not sad because, I've planned my next visit.

Hotel provides 2 bottes of mineral water daily. Safe Box, mini fridge, enough cloth hanger and cloth cabinet was big enough. Has a table where you can do your work, well I needed that most for this trip. Well I never actually had the change to try their breakfast but I heard it was the best part of the hotel.

There is 24/7 mini marts,7-Eleven, big big supermarket within the vincity of the hotel's location. 

Helpful front desk and concierge. Bar had limited cocktails and prices were a bit off the chart considering the location of hotel but no worries you probably would head down to the clubs if you are into drinking and partying. Taxi(Blue Bird) are available 24/7 near the hotel, takes you anywhere. Airport shuttle for drop/pick up is provided for free, you need to check with the hotel of the timings. Hotel provides limo service for 150000 IDR to anywhere you wanna go, that's one way.

Apart from Delta Spa there are few massage places nearby the hotel which is cheaper. Or you can head down to FM7 Resort for their spa which was cheaper than Delta Spa.

Attaching the picture.
title: Affordable , Convient and Away from the Busy City

text:
Just a night of stay here, but the stay was truly memorable.Room is neat and decent though a bit small. What i liked about this hotel is the location. If the idea of perfect location for you is nearby malls and shopping centres,then this is not the place for you. My apologies. But if you are a food freak as i am, then this is the place. Just across the road.is a street similar to jalan jaksa but consolidated in a small area with lots of food outlets. Choice of food is great. We tried Ikan bakar and was it tasty. Yes i give 10 out of 10 for the experience there. once your hunger pangs are satisfied, you look for alternate in this area and realize that the Aston group has famous Delta spa associated with the hotel. This is the place if you want to rejuvenate after a tiresome day. I tried the hot stone massage. The masseuse did an excellent job and i did not realize when i fell asleep. When i woke up it was a new me..all fresh and full of energy. For Astonites, there is a 20% discount on the price quoted. Worth a steal.
As any review, scope for improvement is in the spread of breakfast buffet. Very limited choice especially since i got used to the vast spread offered in Hotel Ciputra.

text:
Arrived in Jakarta on the way to Raja Ampat with a group of 17 persons. We stayed at the Aston for one night arriving and departing Indonesia. The Aston is about 25 to 35 minutes from the airport and has a free shuttle that runs from about 500am in the morning until 1000pm, departing the hotel every two hours. Private transfers can also be pre-arranged for a small fee. Our group was greeted at the airport and after clearing immigration we waited about 10 minutes for the bus to pull up.

On arrival we were promptly assigned rooms and the staff was very helpful. At checkin you are given a complimentary WiFi access code good for a 24 hour period, the WiFi was fast and reliable. The rooms were a bit dated in decor (purple fabrics, faded mirrors, and drop ceilings) but over all the room had all that was needed for our short stay. Flatscreen TV, safe, refrigerator,  and closet. The room was a standard size but could be a bit tight for two people, but since we were basically showering, eating, and sleeping it was sufficient. The bathroom in the first room was spotless and in good condition, on my return visit the second room's bathroom was a bit shabby with a stained toilet bowl, but otherwise clean. 

The dinner menu is pretty bland with high prices, the breakfast (included in room price) was a buffet style set up that started at 600am. There was a variety of food with and an unmanned omelet station that took us some time to track down an employee that could actually make us an omelet. Again it was not outstanding, but served its purpose and had some bakery items that were unexpected. 

The area does have a few eating options nearby and I would suggest exploring them if you are there for longer than 24 hours. 

All in all the staff was friendly and helpful, the shuttle service dependable, and the rooms adequate. In previous visits I have stayed at the Sheraton Bandara and that would be my first choice (very close to airport, larger more modern rooms, much better food) but as a second choice the Aston is a fine stand in.
title: Works for airport layover, comfortable.

owner_response.text: We definitely hope to be your first choice when visiting Jakarta! Other hotels closer to the airport are about double the price. Nonetheless, we will do our very best to earn your preference. Ive asked our corporate team to come for a visit to look at ways to improve our f&b service .

text:
Aston Cengkareng located about 20 minutes to the airport. I stayed with my mother, my husband, and my daughter (2 years) for a night in two standard rooms, a double and a twin. It cost about 69 USD each. Aston Cengkareng covered our basic need, they have nice restaurant, quite clean rooms, spacious enough, and the connecting door really help me a lot to check on my daughter. And they have taxis in front of the hotel.
I wouldn't give five star because it was far from it. They only had artificial garden, the bathroom was standard, and the water quality was lower than it should be (yellowish, but not that bad compared to Mercure Ancol).
If only the receptionist was a bit more dedicated to her job, I would have given full four stars. She looked tired when I checked in, and she seemed like we really have to know it (like "phew"-ing several times or rubbing her forehead). And when my daughter waved goodbye at her, she didn't respond at all, not even smiling. My daughter was only two years old, but I think she was a guest, too.
Final score? Three and half.
title: Not great but good enough

owner_response.text:
Thank you for your feedback. Sorry that our receptionist didn’t notice you’re young daughter waving.
We love kids and want them to have a great time too. I hope you will come back and visit us.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Arrived at about 21 hours local time with kind reservations assistance from a friend residing nearby.

Small but peaceful lobby & was greeted by courteous reception service and checking in was a breeze and was given a room located on the 2nd floor with a cafe and live band on the left hand side of the lobby.

Room exceptable,tidy and had our shower. Ordering of room service made .foods was done proper and delivery time was prompt.

Bedding was comfy and basic with coffee and tea provded.

Next morning woke up rather late so skip BF and walked around outside hotel.
Shop houses left and right.
Shopping mall just 5 minute walk direct in front of the hotel lobby.
Check out 12 noon waited in lobby for hotel bus transfer to airport.

Be back with my spouse.
title: Stopover

owner_response.text: We are happy to hear you had a good time and look forward to seeing you on your next trip!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I checked in on the 1st of June at night and stayed three nights with an extended check-out on the final day. The cleanliness and overall appearance of my suite was impeccable. All of the services offered were first rate and the breakfast was truly a good meal and way to start the day. Shuttle service to and from the airport and central location makes this a hotel I will return to on my next trip.
title: Great place to stay

owner_response.text: Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and thank you for the compliments!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
This is perhaps one of the worst properties of Aston. Even for night halt close to the aiport, this could be only taken, if there are no other options at all.
Reception is very casual and rooms are too small and inadequate. There is nothing worth in neighborhood and prices do not justify the value.
Breakfast is ok and the free shuttle bus is helpful.
I wanted to check on one of the travelers remarks on the loud noise of the attached karaoke disturbing the weary traveler in the night and he is right about it.
Most rooms face a wall and have no view.
Last time, I wrote about Saanu, FM and if a choice was to be made between Saanu , FM and Aston, perhaps, Saanu will be first, second FM and last Aston.

Aston will loose its brand identity , if it continues to keep this property..
title: Keep Away.

text: Not to far from airport, good price, and there's free shuttle bus to airport
title: transit hotel

text:
The room is small. Good furniture , great staff but poor breakfast
It"s crowded , full of others PEMERINTAHAN guest 
They don"t care with the single traveller.
The rest is great beside the bad service in Restaurant
title: Near to the airport is the reason

text:
This hotel is by far the worst hotel, I have ever stayed in my life. At check in, the counter clerk told me I was booked for two nights. I was booked for three nights. Only after checking the Agoda.com reservation paper, he changed my reservation to three days. In the room, I constantly heard a noise of a motor winding up and down all night. I asked to change the room, but they say that they are fully sold out and change can be done on the following day. 
In the morning, they did not tell me a thing. When I got back from an outing, I found that my key no longer worked and found that they switched my room. I asked about the stuff I had in the room safe. I had my wallet with cash over a thousand dollars US and credit cards along with my I-phone. The counter clerk asked the security who handled transfer of my things to the new room told me that there was nothing in the safe. I was furious and worried of fear that all my valuables were stolen. I demanded to check the safe, but they told me that the room was sold already and it would be rude to the new guests. I got more upset as they did not seem to care about my dire situation just because they did not want to disturb the new guests. The security guy kept on asking if I had put those things in the safe. By this time, I was raging. Finally, the shift manager got involved and agreed to open and check the safe for me. It turned out that the room was not even occupied at the time. I input my four digit codes and opened the safe door. My wallet and I-phone were still there as I left them in the morning! I yelled "you guys did not even checked the safe" I could not believe how unprofessional those hotel staff were. 
This was not the end of it. The key did not work again when I came back from my outing. The key was not correctly coded. 
I would not recommend anyone to stay this hotel.
title: The worst hotel I've ever stayed.

text: They have free airport shuttle every 2 hours, but you have to book it in advance. The location is far from everywhere, it takes an hour to airport too (traffic is a mess). It's freezing cold in the hotel, but luckily AC can be turned off in rooms. Free WiFi is available in rooms too.
title: Alternative for short airport transit stay

text:
Indonesia's Business Hotel Chain aston comes with another smooth business hotel in the jakarta suburb of chengkareng. The rooms are clean, good size with flat screen tv and good bathroom. You could compare this hotel with a "holiday inn" property is style and service.

For those in transit, this hotel offers free shuttle to the airport every two hours (traffic can be bad up to one hour travel time in rush hour)

Nothing exceptional here but just a well run business hotel that will leave you neither impressed nor dissapointed.

Good value, good staff attitude, good rooms, does the job.
title: Good Suburban Business Hotel fairly close to the Airport.

text:
The receptionist did not know how to smile and talk politely. I have to wait for 2 hours for my room. They said it would be ready at 2:00 pm, and I check in at 4:00 pm.
House Keeping guys keep talking loudly to each other, they even talk about the other guests.
The location is out of nowhere. Small room and too close to the slum shops in the building next door.
Toilet hygiene is poor. I could see water marks in the toilet.
They don't have swimming pool.

I would not recommend this hotel.
title: Aston employees do not know how to serve guests

text: This hotel is quite near to the airport but stillexpensive if you'll travel by taxi. However, you can opt to be fetched and be dropped by their scheduled free shuttle to and fro from the airport. Be aware that this hotel is still very far from the city center. It is best to stay here if you have early flight by the following day!
title: Nearest hotel from the airport

text: Buzzy vibe , friendly and happily patronized by locals, the rooms are very good with a fantastic rainshower and excellent value for money.
title: decent hotel near airport

text:
I stayed at the hotel for 1 nite. The hotel is located in Cengkareng, about 20 minutes drive from the airport but with traffic jam, it could go up to 1hour or so. The hotel is far from Jakarta Pusat, about 30 minutes without traffic jam and taxi driver told me that it could take 3 hours with the traffic jam.

The room has very basic facilities - toiletries (bath towel, shampoo, shower foam, toothbrush + toothpaste), local tv channels, refrigerator. The room can fit 3 adults at one time although the bathroom is small.

There is a spa and karaoke lounge located next to the hotel but you need to walk out as there is no connecting door to the karaoke lounge and spa. 

There are row of shops selling groceries and restaurants/ small shop selling local delicacies.

Bluebird & Pusaka taxi can be found in front of the hotel from morning till nite but I think by midnight, they must have all left the hotel vicinity. You may ask the front desk to call for taxi if you wish to go out after midnight.

Do take note on the peak hours at Jakarta area because you may end up stuck in the traffic for hours with your taxi fare may go beyond Rp200,000. 

The hotel provides shuttle to/ fro the airport. You may speak to the front desk for arrangement.
title: Basic facilities but very quiet, far from city noise.

text:
My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel based on a recommendation from a friend. The hotel itself in terms of qualit of furnishings and room layout is quite nice. It's modern and has a pretty colour scheme. The rooms are dim so it's romantic, but not so good for business people since it's dark and probably hard to get work done if you're planning to do so from the hotel room. 

The staff don't know very much English and it was kind of hard communicating. They smiled a lot and were friendly though. I wouldn't say they were exactly helpful, but maybe it was because of the language barrier. I do have to say that they don't appear very professional. I was told the hotel was built for only a year or two. The staff seem to be young as well. Maybe it's due to these 2 factors that the staf seem inexperienced. 

As I said before, the rooms have a nice layout and colour scheme, however, the bedsheets almost always come with some kind of stain. Once, we were happen to be in the room and we let housekeeping do their work. When they were finished, the pillow had some minor black marks and the covers had some as well. Maybe they couldn't get rid of it during the wash, but it wasn't a very pretty presentation on the hotel's part. We stayed for one week and there were black marks and stains almost every time. 

Food at the hotel isn't very good. I would rate it a 6/10. Nothing special. The fresh fruit drinks they serve are pretty good though. 

I think the location of the hotel wouldn't be very appealling to most couples. It's located outside of Jakarta city and is in a fairly poor area. You can choose to eat at some small restaurants around the hotel. It's cheap (around 10-15€), but I wouldn't trust the standard of hygiene as my boyfriend got food poisoning after dining at one of these places. If you want to go anywhere, you have to take a taxi. 

Overall, I think this hotel is meant for local guests and not international guests. The language barrier is something you're bound to encounter and you have to be prepared for LONG traffic jams if you're taking taxis to go anywhere. (Reminder: tolls are everywhere and you have to pay quitea bit just on transportation to and from the hotel.)

PS: Forget about internet working here, it doesn't run smoothly at all.
title: Nice rooms, but average customer service, and bad location

owner_response.text:
Dear Nikkiex,

Thank you for sharing review with us, first of all we apologize for any inconvenience stay.
Hopefully we can improve all the services base on your review and look forward to have you stay in our hotel in the near future.

Regards

GENERAL MANAGER
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
I stayed here for a one night layover in Jakarta. Beforehand, I confirmed by 3 separate emails for airport shuttle pickup (free). Of course when I arrived, there was no pickup. When I called the hotel, I was informed that next pickup would be two hours later and they had no explanation for why no one came to pick me up at the appointed shuttle time. 

I arrived on a late flight and wasn't going to get much sleep to begin with. I ended up having to wait for a taxi which took a very long time. When I arrived to check in, I asked for some change to pay the cab driver (who claimed not to have any change). The front desk said they had no change. I noticed that the hotel bar was still open and asked for change from them. They also stated they had no change. 

I went to my room thinking I could at least get a few hours of sleep. Within 15 minutes of going to bed, some VERY LOUD music started up. My entire room was shaking, that's how noisy it was. This was a Monday, not a weekend. I thought it would stop after awhile but at 5 am when I left the hotel, it was still going strong. When I asked about it, the front desk proudly told me that every night of the week (except Sun I think), there is karaoke night all night. They told me I should have requested another room, but then offhandedly told me they were booked for the night anyway!! When I asked to speak to the manager, they told me none was available. I filled in a comments card but I'm sure it went into the trash. I forgot to mention the shower had no hot water. It says a lot that that "minor" issue was so overshadowed by the other problems I had.

I've traveled to many countries and stayed at all different types of hotels, some better than others. This one night had to be one of the worst experiences of my life. I picked this hotel for convenience because it's near the airport. It was actually only 10 min closer than the Ibis Arcadia I stayed at earlier in the week by taxi. The staff were outright rude and clearly did not care to provide any service once the room was paid for. I received no apologies for missed airport pickup, noise, and lack of hot water. To top it all off, this hotel isn't cheap either!! I would probably have been more comfortable sleeping at the airport! STAY AWAY FROM THIS AWFUL HOTEL!!!!!
title: Awful NOISY hotel with the worst service ever. STAY AWAY!!!

text:
Actually I booked after I read the review here. It turned to be absolutely true. Kudos! 

My flight is 8:20 am and I need to get to the airport early in the morning. This hotel is exactly what I am been looking for. I arrived at the hotel around 11:30 am from another hotel in downtown and the front desk girl whose name was Linda was very helpful in asking me whether I went to take the earliest shuttle (6 am) to the airport and whether I would like to have my breakfast to go with me. As a guest services officer working on board a cruise ship myself, I really appreciate that  they predict guest's needs. Very impressive and professional. Kudos to Linda who works in the front desk. I asked for a non-smoking room and it wasn't ready by that time (the standard check-in time was 2 pm), so Linda offered me a smoking room for me to check. I was there for 2 mins and evacuated myself out. Guess that wasn't for me. Then I was told to wait in the lounge for the non-smoking room, which will be ready around 1 pm. About 10 mins later, when I was enjoying myself surfing the Internet, Linda told me the room was ready and offer someone to help me with the luggage to move in. Well, what can I say? That was my lucky day :)

The room interior was purple and white colored, chic and super clean. Cool flat panel TV on the desk, warm lighting (gosh I hate halogen lights), super comfy. Only a small complaint. The switch which controlled the twin bed lights seemed to be broken and I tried all the switches in the room, none could turn them off, so I slept with the bed lights on. Since I was tired that night I didn't care too much, slept like a rock. 

The next morning woke up by the 4:30 alarm set up by the front desk and came down to the lounge around 5:45 am. Checked out, picked up my pre-packed breakfast (a slice of toast, two skinny bread and one cup of water, well, since I am a small girl that was fine) and waited until 6:05 am, the concierge picked my luggage and I joined another family boarded the small mini van. The driver asked me which terminal and asked me to show him the itinerary to make sure. He dropped the family at terminal 3 and then me at terminal 2,  helped with the bags (maaf Pak!) Noticed one small thing: usually in Indonesia passengers have to pay for the highway toll, but our driver paid it, well, not totally out of expectation, but made a good impression on me anyway. 

My one night stay in Aston Cengkareng was very smooth. I spent almost 3 weeks staying in some eight hotels in west Indonesia during vacation and that one was surely the most impressive one. Thanks a lot!
title: great hotel for airport goers

text: Alles im ganzen sehr gut. Das Essen könnte etwas mehr Abwechslung haben. Sonst der Geschmack ist gut. Das Personal ist freundlich und erledigt Gäste wünsche sofort. Das Zimmer ist Standards gemäß in Ordnung . Wer keinen großen Luxus möchte ist in diesem Hotel gut aufgehoben. Vom Flughafen nur 25 min. entfernt.
title: 10 tägige Quarantäne Zeit im Hotel Royal Palm in Jakarta.

text:
Остановились в этом отеле на период карантина 10д/9н. Комната небольшая, но уютная. Кормили очень вкусно, порции большие, всегда приносят воду к приему пищи. Персонал хороший, всегда оповещали о еде и ежедневно предлагали уборку комнаты. Немного не повезло с расположением комнаты, окна выходят во внутренний дворик, на другие окна. Улицы совсем не было видно :( Также Wi-Fi ловил только у двери комнаты. Не очень удобно как для удаленщиков. Опять же, в других номерах интернет ловил в любой точке комнаты. 
Итог: рекомендую, но по возможности просите комнату с видом на улицу.
title: Хороший отель для карантина

text:
Di transito a Jakarta abbiamo scelto questo hotel per la sua vicinanza all’aeroporto e per il servizio navetta compreso nel prezzo della camera. Servizio prenotabile tramite email 3 giorni prima dell’arrivo. 
Anche se non molto lontano dall’aeroporto abbiamo impiegato circa un’ora per arrivare dato il traffico congestionato di Jakarta. 
La hall si presenta bene ma finisce lì, si arriva alle camere e sembra di essere in una struttura diversa .. camera superior al primo piano con arredamento vecchio e mal tenuto, pareti sporche, finestre che non si chiudono bene (la parte di sotto rimane aperta) e bagno sporco. 
La colazione si presenta con un vasto buffet adatto maggiormente per i palati asiatici. Non lontano dall’hotel c’è una sorta di centro commerciale con all’interno qualche ristorante per poter mangiare.
Nel complesso non lo consiglio assolutamente.
title: Decisamente no

text: Брали отель на несколько часов, чтобы передохнуть перед вылетом. Отель удобно расположен рядом с аэропортом (около 5 минут на машине). Брали самый дешевый номер. Довольно чисто, хороший wi-fi. Туалет с душем были не очень (не стерильно чисто). Не порадовало обслуживание на лобби. Девушка требовала от нас банковскую карту, хотя мы сразу предупредили, что платим наличкой. Пыталась забронирвоать нам номер через букинг в своем телефоне, непонятно зачем - потратила наше время.
title: Краткий визит

text: 住在這裡數次，此次經驗最差。毛巾已經很舊了，仍繼續使用。房間馬桶壞了，也不修理。附近有個大排檔，小酌吃飯皆宜。水質不好，都是硬水。不會再住了。
title: 普通

text:
空港からも遠くないので、使いやすいと思います。
ただし、連日使うには、多少、ジャカルタならではの道路事情に起因する、アクセスのしにくさはあります。
価格帯は、私にとっては高くもなく安くもない普通の価格だと感じました。
週に1度は、満室になったり結婚式をしたりするので、結構地元では人気がありそうです。

モールも近くにあり、またレジデンシャルアパート(マンション)の様なゲート付きの建物がありその下には、地元人向けのレストランがたくさん並んでいました。夜は常に人が居る感じです。
またホテルの裏側(同じ建物)では、カラオケ施設がありました。(私は利用しませんでした。)(部屋が近いと歌が聞こえて五月蝿い。)
またホテルの外にもカラオケやマッサージの文字が見えました。

不便に感じたのは、ランドリーの受け取りは、毎回部屋に呼び出し、支払いをしないと戻って来ません。またお釣りなどを勝手にチップとして受け取ってしまうので、それが嫌な方は、フロントデスクまで呼んで持って来てもらいそこで支払うのが良いと思います。

ホテルのレストランでの夕食は、あまりオススメ出来ないと感じました。オーダーして、出てくるまでに最大1時間近くかかります。(他にお客が居ても、居なくても)
また金額も高いです。外の3倍近いと感じました。
title: ジャカルタでビジネスユースに

text:
Wij hebben hier een dag geboekt omdat onze volgende vlucht ruim een halve dag later vertrekt dan aankomst. 

Op de kaart is het dichtbij de aankomst terminal, maar het is toch een half uur rijden zonder file en aangezien er altijd file is in Jakarta, is het toch wel een flinke rit.

Onderhoud wordt niet superveel aan gedaan. Maar de service is wel goed. De ramen die open vlogen tijdens een storm werden meteen vast geschroefd. De wc die na het eerste bezoek verstopt raakte werd meteen ontstopt.

Eten in het restaurant was redelijk. De saté spaghetti waren goed! De patat een beetje slap. Verder veel van de "Westerse" gerechten (cheese burger, hotdogs, Fanta) uitverkocht.

Gratis WiFi wat er af en toe uit klapt. Streamen werkt niet, maar social media, e-mail en dergelijke werkt prima.

Foto's zijn gemaakt toen het hotel net geopend was denk ik. Ik herken het niet echt terug.

Maar al met al prima transit hotel. In ieder geval schoon, wat toch het belangrijkste is.
title: Transit hotel

text: Хороший отель для одной ночи, так как находится недалеко от аэропорта. Приличный завтрак, быстрое заселение. Рядом с отелем есть очень интересное и колоритное кафе где можно отведать национальной индонезийской кухни!)
title: Близко к аэропорту

text: 旅行初日にお世話になったホテルです。スカルノハッタ空港から送迎バスで高速道路で30分ぐらいで到着しました。ちなみに送迎バスは頼んでいた時間には来ません。渋滞のせいらしいです。ホテルは無料のパソコンがロビーにあったり　夜は生バンドがあったりとなかなか豪華な感じです。レストランもおいしかったです。外には少し歩けば屋台が何軒もあります。朝ご飯はメニューも豊富で楽しめましたがお国柄でしょうかハエが飛んでいて　レタスにくっついているのを見ると食欲を失います。飛行機の便は遅い人。または早朝の人向けのトランジットホテルです。まわりにこれといったものはありませんでした
title: トランジットホテルです

text: Отель хорош тем, что находится близко к международному аэропорту, и в стоимость проживания входит бесплатный трансфер.Что же до номера, то он тесноват, особенно ванная комната. Ресторан хороший, большой выбор блюд.Для одной ночи вполне подходящий отель.
title: Хорошее расположение

text: Плюсы - расположение, качество обслуживания, близость к торговому центру. Улучшенный номер - достаточно просторный, но не очень чистый. Хороший завтрак. Есть чартер в аэропорт. Отзывчивый персонал. В целом - крепкий "середняк"
title: Достойный отель, близко расположенный к аэропорту

text: comodo per la vicinanza all'aeroporto, perfetto quindi come appoggio, anche la colazione non è male. il servizio shuttle gratuito per l'aeroporto ha orari rigidi perciò come è successo a noi, potrebbe essere inutilizzabile.
title: hotel pulito ed economico

text: We bleven hier omdat we enigszins dichtbij het vliegveld wilden zitten. Daar is het uitermate geschikt voor. Bediening is aardig en kamers zijn prima. Shuttle service gebruikt naar het vliegveld, erg fijn. Ophalen is op verzoek.
title: Goed hotel voor kort verblijf

text: Het is een net hotel met nette kamers en een gratis shuttle (ca. 20 minuten) naar het Internationale vliegveld van Jakarta. Verder heb je in Cengkareng niets te zoeken of je moet nog even naar het warenhuis Mata Hari willen, dat vlakbij het hotel is gelegen.

text:
翌日早朝の帰国のトランジットの為に利用しました。
ホテルの到着も日が落ちてからになり、近くに食事する所が無いのでは？！と気になりましたが、ホテルのはす向かいに屋台村のように屋台が10軒程度出ており、最後のインドネシアの食事を色々と楽しむ事が出来、良い思い出になりました。
部屋もベッドも広かったのですが、コンセントが日本の規格に合っていない為、物理的に携帯電話の充電をする事が出来ませんでした。（アダプターを持参するか、フロントに言えば貸してもらえる?!）
その部分を除けば、空港からも比較的に近く、翌日早朝の飛行機に乗る予定の方は利用する価値は有ると思います。
title: コンセントが日本のモノは使え無かった…

locations.name: Royal Palm Hotel & Conference Center Cengkareng

text:
Elegimos este hotel por su proximidad al aeropuerto y porque ofrecía un servicio de transporte al aeropuerto. De este servicio no nos pudimos beneficiar ya que llegamos casi a las 23h cuando ya acababa el servicio y nos marchamos a las 7h de la mañana y a esa hora tampoco hay, hay a las 6 o a las 8 y no nos iba bien.
  Un taxi del aeropuerto al hotal nos costó 80k IDR.
Todo lo demas correcto: buena cama, limpieza correcta, el wifi funcionaba bien y el desayuno aceptable ( repostería un poco dura, zumos malos, pero en general bastante variedad).

  Me volvería a alojar en el hotel pero tened en cuenta las limitaciones del transporte al aeropuerto.
title: Todo correcto pero transporte gratuito al aeropuerto muy limitado.

text: Nos alojamos aqui en una escala a Jakarta y nos resulto perfecto.TIenen un servicio gratuito de recogida en el aeropuerto,el hotel esta a unos 30 minutos.Habitaciones limpias y comodas.Teniamos que madrugar al dia siguiente y a parte de despertarnos y llamar al taxi nos prepararon el desayuno para llevar.SIn duda una muy buena opcion si se quiere estar cerca del aeropuerto, si no esta demasiado lejos del centro.
title: Perfecto para el aeropuerto

text: interesante hotel si solo quieres dormir una noche en transito entre dos vuelos, ya que tiene un servicio gratuito al aeropuerto que funciona realmente bien

text: Un hotel comodo e pulito, vicino all'aeroporto. Le stanze sono ben fornite e in stile moderno. Unica pecca: il servizio di navetta da/per l'aeroporto viaggia solo in orari pre-stabiliti (il che significa che, se arrivate alle 9.10 e la navetta viaggia alle 9 e alle 11, dovrete aspettare le 11 prima che la navetta passi a prendervi!
title: Buon hotel, pulito e vicino all'aeroporto

text:
Cet hôtel très occidental est situé à une vingtaine de minutes de l'aéroport international de Jakarta. Le grand avantage de cet hôtel est qu'un chauffeur vient vous chercher à votre arrivée à l'aéroport et peut vous y reconduire le lendemain pour votre vol. C'est donc une très bonne solution en cas d'escale "longue" à Jakarta (entre Denpasar et Paris par exemple, via Jakarta). L'hôtel est très moderne, réalisé selon les goûts occidentaux. 
Le petit-déjeuner est bien et copieux, servis sous forme de buffet, et inclus dans le prix de la chambre, qui n'est pas donné toutefois (50 dollars sur internet, mais les cartes européennes ne passent malheureusement pas !) et 60 dollars sur place. Le personnel est professionnel mais assez détaché aussi. C'est un grand hôtel donc beaucoup de passage. 
A recommander uniquement quand on a besoin de rester près de l'aéroport !
title: pratique quand on a besoin de rester près de l'aéroport de Jakarta
